metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24660 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in LemonLDAP::NG through 2.0.8, when NGINX is used.An attacker may bypass URL-based access control to protected Virtual Hostsby submitting a non-normalized URI. This also affects versions before 0.5.2of the "Lemonldap::NG handler for Node.js" package.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
